product_name: GNU B-Nice Series BTX Snowboard - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: Riding a snowboard doesn't have to be tough. If you're new to shredding and looking for a board that's easy to turn and flex, choose the GNU B-Nice Series BTX women's snowboard. Banana Technology puts rocker between your feet; control is balanced in the center, and the catch-free ends float and climb through tight transitions. Magne-Traction improves edge grip by adding seven contact points along the running length of the board, resulting in amazing control whether riding ice or pow. Twin shape (tip and tail are equal in length and width) and centered sidecut ride equally well in both directions, great for all-mountain freestyle riding. Lightweight aspen wood core offers an even flex and low spin weight; fiberglass increases board stiffness and pop. Impact-resistant end-grain internal sidewalls; UHMW sidewalls stand up to wear and tear; steel edges; extruded base is fast and low maintenance. .
short_description: Riding a snowboard doesn't have to be tough. If you're new to shredding and looking for a board that's easy to turn and flex, choose the GNU B-Nice Series BTX women's snowboard.
